StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetDataSheetContractSectorsByFY]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @OrgID int ,@FY int ) AS
BEGIN
SET NOCOUNT ON
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
CREATE TABLE #DEFAULT_SECTOR_TOTALS_TABLE ( Year int ,Month int ,MonthIndex int ,Sector varchar(10) )
/** First ini.alize all the possible sectors **/ DECLARE @month_counter int SET @month_counter = 1 DECLARE @sector_leter char DECLARE @max_month int SET @max_month = 12
CREATE TABLE #SectorTable ( Sector VARCHAR(2) Not NULL )
INSERT INTO #SectorTable(Sector) SELECT DISTINCT ms.SectorDesignator sector FROM USMC.MapsSector ms INNER JOIN MCRISS.DBO.RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION org ON ms.Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId = org.rowguid WHERE org.Organiza.on_Id = @OrgID ORDER BY SectorDesignator
WHILE @month_counter <= @max_month BEGIN
INSERT INTO #DEFAULT_SECTOR_TOTALS_TABLE(Year, Month, MonthIndex, Sector) SELECT CASE WHEN @month_counter IN (10,11,12) THEN @FY - 1 ELSE @FY END AS Year ,@month_counter AS Month ,(CASE WHEN @month_counter IN (10,11,12) THEN @month_counter-10 ELSE @month_counter+2 END) AS MonthIndex ,Sector FROM #SectorTable
INSERT INTO #DEFAULT_SECTOR_TOTALS_TABLE(Year, Month, MonthIndex, Sector) SELECT CASE WHEN @month_counter IN (10,11,12) THEN @FY - 1 ELSE @FY END AS Year ,@month_counter AS Month ,(CASE WHEN @month_counter IN (10,11,12) THEN @month_counter-10 ELSE @month_counter+2 END) AS MonthIndex ,'OA' AS Sector
SET @month_counter = @month_counter + 1 END /** ini.alize all the possible sectors **/
/** get all contract rows for FY with sector **/ SELECT RPT_YEAR ,RPT_MONTH ,RSS_ORG_ID ,(CASE WHEN Sector IS NOT NULL THEN Sector ELSE 'OA' END) AS Sector INTO #SECTOR_TEMP FROM [MCRISS_OLAP].[dbo].CONTRACTS WHERE RSS_ORG_ID = @OrgID AND ((RPT_YEAR = @FY-1 AND RPT_MONTH IN (10,11,12)) OR (RPT_YEAR = @FY AND RPT_MONTH < 10)) /** end get all contract rows for FY with sector **/
/** total the contract rows for each sector/year/month **/ SELECT RPT_YEAR AS Year ,RPT_MONTH AS Month ,Sector ,COUNT(Sector) AS Contracts INTO #SECTOR_TOTALS FROM #SECTOR_TEMP WHERE RSS_ORG_ID = @OrgID AND ((RPT_YEAR = @FY-1 AND RPT_MONTH IN (10,11,12)) OR (RPT_YEAR = @FY AND RPT_MONTH < 10)) GROUP BY RPT_YEAR, RPT_MONTH, Sector ORDER BY RPT_YEAR, RPT_MONTH, Sector /** end total the contract rows for each sector/year/month **/
SELECT st.Year ,st.Month ,st.Sector ,st.MonthIndex ,CASE WHEN st.Contracts IS NOT NULL THEN st.Contracts ELSE 0 END AS Contracts ,st.Sector + '-' + (CASE WHEN st.Contracts IS NOT NULL THEN CAST(st.Contracts AS VARCHAR(10)) ELSE '0' END) AS DisplayName FROM #DEFAULT_SECTOR_TOTALS_TABLE st LEFT JOIN #SECTOR_TOTALS st ON st.Year = st.Year AND st.Month = st.Month AND st.Sector = st.Sector
ORDER BY YEAR ASC, MONTH ASC
DROP TABLE #SectorTable DROP TABLE #SECTOR_TEMP DROP TABLE #SECTOR_TOTALS DROP TABLE #DEFAULT_SECTOR_TOTALS_TABLE
END
